key.name: gdpr_request_download_email_text
key.value: User {$username} requested to download all personal data associated with his profile.

key.name: gdpr_request_deletion_email_text
key.value: User {$username} requested to delete his profile from the site.

key.name: gdpr_third_party_services_desc
key.value: Activate this setting, if your site use third party services like google analytics, moz.com etc, to collect anonymous users data

key.name: gdpr_third_party_text
key.value:
For business, analytical and administrative purposes, our website also employs the following 3rd party services:

  • Scheduled updates / newsletter are handled by MailChimp and may have your email, IP addresses used to open entails and geographical data as provided by browsers.
  • We employ Intercom for providing sales, pre-sales support and based on your interaction, your email, IP address and location may have been recorded.
  • Ougoing emails are handled by mandrill.com and they maintain the delivery reports for each mail for 9O days, as per their policy.
  • Anonymous data for analytics is collected by Google Analytics, moz.com and such data does not contain any personal identifiable records of any user.

key.name: gdpr_personal_data_note
key.value: Please, note that you have confided us with your detailed profile information which you can edit anytime

key.name: gdpr_user_data_note
key.value: You have entrusted us with the following personal data (including you detailed Profile information). NOTE: This information is essential for proper account functioning. Here you can review, edit, update, download or delete this information as you wish.

key.name: user_data_note
key.value:
You have entrusted us with the following personal data (including you detailed Profile information).

NOTE: This information is essential for proper account functioning. Here you can review, edit, update, download or delete this information as you wish.

key.name: third_party_note
key.value:
Scheduled updates / newsletter are handled by MailChimp and may have your email, IP addresses used to open entails and geographical data as provided by browsers.

We employ Intercom for providing sales, pre-sales support and based on your interaction, your email, IP address and location may have been recorded.

Ougoing emails are handled by mandrill.com and they maintain the delivery reports for each mail for 9O days, as per their policy.

Anonymous data for analytics is collected by Google Analytics, moz.com and such data does not contain any personal identifiable records of any user.
